channel.title: Where to start
channel.description:
I recently got bored and went on my pure I made back in '07, and since I was bored, I thought I might aswell put membership on it, as I nothing better to do.
A lot has changed since since the last time I played, and I'm thinking it's pointless having a pure nowadays, 1 def anyway, so it seems pointless just training range, when I'm not going to do anything with it.
[50 combat level] [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/w884g8.jpg[/img]
I've got around 5m in cash, and don't know what to do with it. I got it by merching black masks back in the day, along with donations of others :).
So what to do? What are the best stats for PvP? Or how can I train skills as a pure, and get decent drops somewhere?
Leave your ideas please :).

item.title: Where to start
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

p.s. dont level defence, use quests to do it for you so you can be a rune pure with barrows gloves

Read full topic

item.title: Where to start
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“Kaza, post:7, topic:313598”]I’m only going to go for around 40-45 defence, but thankyou :).

Get prayer? Or stay at level 1?[/quote]
If you’re getting defense then prayer is a must.

Read full topic

item.title: Where to start
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

I’m only going to go for around 40-45 defence, but thankyou :).

Get prayer? Or stay at level 1?

item.title: Where to start
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“cows_be_sacred, post:5, topic:313598”][quote author=Kaza link=topic=410108.msg3034666#msg3034666 date=1258649278]
I trained to 74 range and realised that pvp is shite.

So, what quests would you reccomend for defence / prayer exp?
[/quote]
Monkey madness, Dragon slayer, horror from the deep, experiments quest.

If you do mm and ds they should easily bring you up to 50 defense. As for prayer those 2 quests my bring you to ~15-20[/quote]Then you can do ectoplasm.

Read full topic

item.title: Where to start
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“Kaza, post:4, topic:313598”]I trained to 74 range and realised that pvp is shite.

So, what quests would you reccomend for defence / prayer exp?[/quote]
Monkey madness, Dragon slayer, horror from the deep, experiments quest.

If you do mm and ds they should easily bring you up to 50 defense. As for prayer those 2 quests my bring you to ~15-20

Read full topic

item.title: Where to start
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

1 def pures are not pointless, but 20 def pures are quite good as an alternative… but make sure you never train defence or prayer, use quests for that.

Read full topic
